title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

code: (This file was auto-generated from 'cargo metadata' on 2025-02-04)

title: Format SQL Queries
text: SQLFormatteR R package provides easy--use wrapper sqlformat-rs Rust-based SQL formatter. allows format SQL queries support various SQL dialects directly R.

title: Format SQL Queries
text: Simple seamless integration R. Maintains SQL query readability consistency. Supports standard SQL formatting options.

title: Format SQL Queries
text: support formatting stored procedures. supports ; delimiter SQL statements (custom delimiters available).

title: Format SQL Queries
text: can install SQLFormatteR GitHub using:
code: # Install devtools if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("remotes")  remotes::install_github("dataupsurge/SQLFormatteR")

title: Format SQL Queries
code: library(SQLFormatteR)  sql_query <- "SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name;"  formatted_sql <- sql_format(sql_query)  cat(formatted_sql)

title: Format SQL Queries
text: welcome contributions! Feel free submit issues pull requests improve package.

title: Format SQL Queries
text: project licensed GPL3 License. See LICENSE file details. However, depends sqlformat-rs, licensed MIT. must retain original MIT license notice distributing package. ⭐ find package useful, please consider giving star GitHub!

title: Format an SQL Query — sql_format
text: function formats SQL query based various styling options.

title: Format an SQL Query — sql_format
code: sql_format(   query,   indent = 2L,   uppercase = TRUE,   lines_between_queries = 1L,   ignore_case_convert = NULL )

title: Format an SQL Query — sql_format
text: query character string containing SQL query format. indent integer specifying number spaces indentation (default: 2). uppercase logical value indicating whether SQL keywords converted uppercase (default: TRUE). lines_between_queries integer specifying number blank lines queries (default: 1). ignore_case_convert logical value indicating whether case conversion (default: NULL).

title: Format an SQL Query — sql_format
text: formatted SQL query character string.

title: Format an SQL Query — sql_format
code: formatted_query <- sql_format("SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1") cat(formatted_query) #> SELECT #>   * #> FROM #>   users #> WHERE #>   id = 1
